inclusion.criterion: COPD with two or more exacerbations every year or at least one leading to hospitalization.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient has a history of COPD and has had multiple exacerbations in the past year.

exclusion.criterion: the study is designed for a real life dimension and the algorithm can be used to convey information of interest for worsening of non-respiratory pathology.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Each patient will be provided with the BPCOmedia Kit for measuring the status of patient's health COPD.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of COPD and multiple exacerbations in the past year. However, the study is designed for real-life conditions and may not be suitable for this patient.
